word: G3424 - μογιλάλος - mogilálos - mog-il-al'-os - Having an impediment in his speech

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Having an impediment in his speech
speaking with a harsh or thick voice, speaking with difficulty
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G3425 and G2980; hardly talking, that is, dumb (tongue tied): - having an impediment in his speech.
